Al Shamkha Area:
Located far from central Abu Dhabi, Al Shamkha is a large modern neighborhood with world-class amenities for its residents. The highway - Sheikh Mohammad Bin Zayed Road (E311) - borders the area on the north-eastern side. Along the northern length of Al Shamkha, Sweihan Road is also situated leading towards the outskirts of Abu Dhabi.
Some areas of Al Shamkha were redeveloped in 2016. The Municipality of Abu Dhabi and Abu Dhabi Housing Authority has overseen the development of residential plots within the area. Due to the recent construction, many community facilities such as schools, commercial spaces, health facilities, parks, entertainment options, cycle lanes and mosques have been added.

descriptions: ['DescriptionAl Bateen Park is Aldar\x92s newest residential community located in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Abu Dhabi.Opened for residents in December 2012, Al Bateen Park is an exclusive community for UAE Nationals. The project consists of 75 villas Each villa in Al Bateen Park comes with spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, private gardens, maids\x92 rooms, modern kitchens and bathrooms and some with private swimming pools.Located in the exclusive Al Bateen area on Al Khaleej Al Arabi Street, Al Bateen Park is a gated community spread out over more than 100,000m2. Residents can enjoy landscaped gardens, children\x92s play areas, multi-purpose courts, a common area swimming pool and water features throughout the community.Residents of Al Bateen Park enjoy the highest levels of services from the Aldar Estates team including community and leasing management and 24-hour gated security.\nCall Moaaz Koubaitary on +971528190633 / +97125852333 or visit www.edwardsandtowers.com for further details']

  Brand New.

Business Bay is situated at Dubai Creek near down town Dubai and goes along from Ras Al Khor to Sheikh Zayed Road. Deliberately based for worldwide businesses as it is located along Sheikh Zayed Road with its towers housing international firms and the finance companies of the Dubai International Financial Center. International Hotels, including the Emirates Towers and the Shangri-La are also on Sheikh Zayed Road.
For inquiries or viewing request,

title_advert: ['Stunning View|Large Balcony|Top Floor|Well Maintained']
location1: ['New Bridge Hills 1Dubai, Motor City, New Bridge Hills']
descriptions: ['DescriptionExclusive3 Bedroom ApartmentTop FloorPark/Greenery View2,532 sqft AreaExcellent LocationWell Maintained\nDeja Vu Real Estate is pleased to bring this lovely apartment to the market. \xa0Situated in the popular Motor City area, this unit has a prime view as it is on the top Floor of Newbridge Hills.This 3 bedroom apartment has a spacious 2,532 sqft including a massive balcony that can be fantastic for entertaining or even just using for a quiet beverage.This is owner-occupied with no outstanding finance meaning that it is well maintained, vacant on transfer, and can be transferred easily.Motor City is a fantastic community having a revamped retail/restaurant area, the Dubai Autodrome (free use for cyclists and runners on most Wednesdays), schools, and is easily accessible from most parts of Dubai.Call Ratib to arrange your viewing. \xa0Agents are also welcome to get in touch.']
